Team

Save web developers from wysiwyg evil

Alan is the creator of summernote and a long-time contributor.

lqez is contributing to develop summernote and django-summernote.

rorlab is contribution to develop summernote-rails.

Outsider is a web developer and blogger who loves writing code. He is mainly responsible for angular-summernote

Easylogic is a javascript mania. He have interested a svg chart currently.

Seapy is a curious developer and summernote-rails contributor.

  About Us

We co-worked remained time for this project.

  Our Goal

Save web developers from WYSIWYG evil. This is our history.

  Help Us

Help us with any suggestion or some of codes on GitHub Issues.
